alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 19 at 8:51PM PDT until July 19 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR ESMERALDA COUNTY... At 851 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area have started to weaken. Nearly 1.50" of rain fell southeast of Dyer near Highway 264 and Wallace Farms. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Coaldale, Dyer, Lida, Silver Peak, Fish Lake Valley, Goldfield, Lida Junction and Boundary Peak. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
